p: In our study, there was neurological sequel in 35 (68.6%) patients, whereas no neurological sequel in 16 (31.4%) patients. There was need for intensive care unit (ICU) care in 37 (72.5%) patients, while 14 (27.5%) patients did not require ICU care. Subsequent epilepsy was developed in 33 (64.7%) patients in the patient group. It was found out that 1 patient died due to convulsion after enrollment ito the study. The need for ICU care and epilepsy indicated that the disease has poor prognosis.
